...2COR 12.1 _nins fraujins.
2COR 12.2 wait mannan in Xristau faur jera ·id·, jaþþe in leika ni wait, jaþþe inu leik ni wait, guþ wait, frawulwanana þana swaleikana und þridjan himin;
2COR 12.3 jah wait þana swaleikana mannan, jaþþe in leika jaþþe inu leik ni wait, guþ wait, 2COR 12.4 þatei frawulwans warþ in wagg jah hausida unqeþja waurda, þoei ni skulda sind mann rodjan.
2COR 12.5 faur þana swaleikana ƕopa, iþ faur mik silban ni waiht ƕopa, niba in unmahtim meinaim.
2COR 12.6 aþþan jabai wiljau ƕopan, ni sijau unwita, unte sunja qiþa, iþ freidja, ibai ƕas in mis ƕa muni ufar þatei gasaiƕiþ aiþþau gahauseiþ ƕa us mis.
2COR 12.7 jah bi filusnai andhuleino, ei ni ufarhafnau, atgibana ist mis hnuþo leika meinamma, aggilus Satanins, ei mik kaupastedi, ei ni ufarhugjau.
2COR 12.8 bi þatei þrim sinþam fraujan baþ ei afstoþi af mis;
2COR 12.9 jah qaþ mis:
ganah þuk ansts meina, unte mahts in siukein ustiuhada.
filu gabaurjaba nu mais ƕopa in siukeim meinaim, ei ufarhleiþrjai ana mis mahts Xristaus.
2COR 12.10 in þizei mis galeikaiþ in siukeim, in anamahtim, in nauþim, in wrekeim, in þreihslam faur Xristu;
unte þan siuka, þan mahteigs im.
2COR 12.11 warþ unwita ƕopands,
jus mik gabaidideduþ;
aþþan ik skulds was fram izwis gakannjan, unte ni waihtai mins habaida þaim ufar filu apaustaulum, jah jabai ni waihts im.
2COR 12.12 aiþþau sweþauh taikneis apaustaulus gatawidos waurþun in izwis in allai þulainai, taiknim jah fauratanjam jah mahtim.
2COR 12.13 ƕa auk ist, þize wanai weseiþ ufar anþaros aikklesjons, niba þatei ik silba ni kaurida izwis?
fragibiþ mis þata skaþis.
2COR 12.14 sai, þridjo þata manwus im qiman at izwis, janni kaurja izwis;
unte ni sokja izwaros aihtins, ak izwis;
ni auk skulun barna fadreinam huzdjan, ak fadreina barnam.
2COR 12.15 aþþan ik laþaleiko fraqima jah fraqimada faur saiwalos izwaros, sweþauh ei ufarassau izwis frijonds mins frijoda.
2COR 12.16 aþþan siai nu,
ik ni kaurida izwis, ak wisands aufto listeigs hindarweisein izwis nam.
2COR 12.17 ibai þairh ƕana þizeei insandida du izwis bifaihoda izwis?
2COR 12.18 baþ Teitu jah miþinsandida imma broþar;
ibai ƕa bifaihoda izwis Teitus?
niu þamma samin ahmin iddjedum?
niu þaim samam laistim?
2COR 12.19 aftra þugkeiþ izwis ei sunjoma uns wiþra izwis?
in andwairþja gudis in Xristau rodjam, þat-uþ-þan all, liubans, in izwaraizos gatimreinais.

2COR 12.20 unte og, ibai aufto qimands ni swaleikans swe wiljau bigitau izwis, jah ik bigitaidau izwis swaleiks swe ni wileiþ mik, ibai aufto þwairheins, aljan, jiukos, bihaita, birodeinos, haifsteis, ufswalleinos, drobnans;
2COR 12.21 ibai aftra qimandan mik guþ gahaunjai at izwis jah qaino managans þize faura frawaurkjandane janni idreigondane ana unhrainiþai þoei gatawidedun, horinassau jah aglaitja.
2COR 13.1 þridjo þata qima at izwis.
ana munþa twaddje weitwode jaþþrije gastandiþ all waurde.
2COR 13.2 fauraqaþ jah aftra fauragateiha,
swaswe andwairþs anþaramma sinþa jah aljaþro nu melja þaim faura frawaurkjandam jah anþaraim allaim, þatei jabai qima, aftra ni freidja.
2COR 13.3 unte kustu sokeiþ þis in mis rodjandins Xristaus, saei ni siukiþ in izwis, ak mahteigs ist in izwis.
2COR 13.4 aþþan jabai jah ushramiþs was us siukein, akei libaiþ us mahtai gudis;
jah auk weis siukam in imma, akei libam miþ imma us mahtai gudis in izwis.
2COR 13.5 silbans fraisiþ sijaidu in galaubeinai;
silbans izwis kauseiþ,
þau niu kunnuþ izwis þatei Iesus Xristus in izwis ist?
nibai aufto ungakusanai sijuþ.
2COR 13.6 aþþan wenja þatei kunneiþ ei weis ni sium ungakusanai.
2COR 13.7 aþþan bidja du guda ei ni waiht ubilis taujaiþ;
ni ei weis gakusanai þugkjaima, ak ei jus þata godo taujaiþ, iþ weis swe ungakusanai þugkjaima.
2COR 13.8 ni auk magum ƕa wiþra sunja, ak faur sunja.
